description: A patient who tested positive for coronavirus carried on with their daily routine for several days.
title: Coronavirus: Search for 73 people linked to patient
title_page: Coronavirus: Search for 73 people linked to patient - BBC News
maintext: It is estimated there are 1,439 islanders under compulsory self-isolation, most of them being returning travellers such as students after Guernsey imposed a 14-day quarantine period for people coming to the island.
